import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import {useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import * as yup from 'yup' import { Footer } from '../components/footer.js' import shoe from '../images/shoe.png' import minishoe from '../images/minishoe.png' export const CreateProduct = () => { const {register, handleSubmit} = useForm() const onSubmit = (data) =>{ console.log("hello") } const shema = yup.object().shape({ name: yup.string().min(4).required("You must add the name of the product"), price: yup.number().integer().positive().required("You must add the price"), type: yup.string().min(4).required("You must add the type of the product"), quantity: yup.number().integer().positive().min(1).required("You must add the Stock Quantity") }) return (

Product Name

Price of the Product

Colors

Type

Stock Quantity

SKU

Stock Quantity

Regular Price

Sales Price

*/}
{/* graphic stuff for the product */}

Product Thumbnail.png
*/}
) }
